bullets: TypeScript/JavaScript
HTML/CSS
Node.js
React
Git

children.title: Search Movie Quotes Webapp
bullets: Continuously pushing updates to over 147,000 users around the world
Implemented custom fuzzy search to instantly search 97,447 quotes across 3 franchises
Uses virtualized lists to render thousands of quotes at a time
Handles user creation using Firebase auth
Authenticated users can contribute to the quote database (suggesting corrections and matching quotes to characters)
The front end is currently using React, built with Webpack and deployed via Netlify

children.title: SMQ Database Builder
bullets: .srt, .xml and .vtt parser that builds the database that SearchMovieQuotes.com uses
Can fetch .xml and chunked .vtt files from Netflix and Disney+ respectively
All written in TypeScript using good OO practices and TDD (with Mocha + Chai)
Data scrubbing for text for the Hearing Impaired and leading character names
Forms complete sentences 98% of the time
This is an evolving database from user contributions via SearchMovieQuotes.com

children.title: University of British Columbia
children.subtitle: Teaching Assistant, Models of Computation
bullets: Collaborated with a team of 13 TAs to support learning in a fast-paced summer course
Presented to a group of about 20 students and provided hands-on support 6 times a week
Developed rubrics and graded assignments in a timely manner
